data_table.name: T2D_Starr_Data
data_table.study_name: Starr County Health Studies' Genetics of Diabetes Study

variable.comment: This is an assigned de-identified number for each sample. The format consists of 'CD' followed by a 4 digit integer
This is an assigned de-identified number for each sample. The format consists of 'CD' followed by a 4 digit integer

Cases were chosen as individuals with type 2 diabetes that were identified as Mexican Americans. Classification of diabetes was based on National Diabetes Data Group recommendations from 1978. All such individuals also meet current recommendations. Indivi Controls were chosen because they had no history of diabetes and were negative for diabetes on an oral glucose tolerance test using a 75 gm glucose load.

Cases were chosen as individuals with type 2 diabetes that were identified as Mexican Americans. Classification of diabetes was based on National Diabetes Data Group recommendations from 1978. All such individuals also meet current recommendations. Indivi Controls were chosen because they had no history of diabetes and were negative for diabetes on an oral glucose tolerance test using a 75 gm glucose load.
Calculated as weight in kg divided by the height in meters squared.
Calculated as weight in kg divided by the height in meters squared.

Waist circumference at the umbilicus measured in cm divided by the hip circumference (at widest point) also measured in cm. In one series of potential cases, circumferences were not obtained thus explaining a higher than ordinary number of missing values.

Waist circumference at the umbilicus measured in cm divided by the hip circumference (at widest point) also measured in cm. In one series of potential cases, circumferences were not obtained thus explaining a higher than ordinary number of missing values.

variable.description: Total plasma high density lipoprotein cholesterol
Total plasma high density lipoprotein cholesterol

variable.comment: Calculated according to the Friedewald equation (Chol - Trig/5 - HDLT) when Trig < 400. For Trig >= 400, LDL is set to missing
Calculated according to the Friedewald equation (Chol - Trig/5 - HDLT) when Trig < 400. For Trig >= 400, LDL is set to missing
Taken as the average of two measures (2nd and 3rd) using a Hawksley Random Zero Sphygmomanometer

Oral glucose tolerance test was performed using a 75 gm glucose load Not performed in Cases.

Not applicable in Controls

Retinopathy was classified based on stereoscopic fundus photographs of seven standard fields as implemented in the Early Treatment of Diabetic Retinopathy trial. Retinopathy was considered to be present for any grading of 20 or more based on the Modified
